name: Rajesh Ramsaroop
body:
# Rajesh Ramsaroop

Website (Portfolio & Blog): [Beware of Raj](http://www.bewareofraj.com)

E-mail: [raj@bewareofraj.com](mailto:raj@bewareofraj.com)

## Statement

Software developer with experience in creating solutions for web, desktop and mobile.

## Education

**B.S. Information Technology** (Concentration in Software Development) - Georgia Gwinnett College

**A.A.S. Computer Programming** - Gwinnett Technical College

## Work Experience

**Digital Designer (Frontend Developer)** (GE Capital Retail Bank/Synchrony Bank) _March 2014 - August 2014_
* Update web pages to meet legal formatting requirements using HTML and CSS
* Code HTML e-mail marketing campaigns
* Utilize Adobe InDesign and Illustrator to create or update direct mail marketing documents

**Desktop Support Intern** (Cornerstone Media Group) _September 2011 - May 2012_
* Provided technical support for client’s web sites
* Identified problems with client web sites and provided solutions
* Maintained client’s web sites
* Programmed web sites for clients according to their needs

## Skills

**Languages:** Java, PHP, Objective-C, C#, HTML/CSS/JavaScript, SQL

**Software and Operating Systems:** Windows, Linux, Mac OS X, MySQL/SQLite, Apache, 
Eclipse IDE, Processing.org, Sublime Text, X-Code, WordPress, Magento, phpBB, Photoshop

**Technologies/Platforms:** Android, iOS, Git, LAMP servers

**Other Skills:** Object oriented programming, Agile software development (Scrum)

## References

Available upon request.
